Comments
October 11, 2022
Goop
He is probably best used with the Starter Invisible Woman that can throw a 19defend barrier marker wherever he is. Otherwise its just too easy for someone to turn and one shot him. He is pretty solid for only 25 points though, run him at your opponent and then unleash everything you got on their team. A one trick pony but its a hell of a trick to pull off.
June 16, 2022
hoojeebo
Yeah he totally affects friendlies too.
June 16, 2022
bam
A player that fields this guy needs to be careful, I believe this beanie wearing dude would affect friendlies based on his text.
May 1, 2022
jimmyboy
Wow, OK this guy is a must-have for me. He can still trigger the boosting effect with Artie, and he now has the Fantastic Four keyword. Only downside is that he doesn't have the Sidekick role tag, so he can't play with the Thing Robots. But otherwise I'd likely be playing him more often than the Future Foundation Leech.
April 24, 2022
ugavine
Okay for shutting off defences, but think I prefer the original.
April 21, 2022
hoojeebo
The original dial didn't turn off powers at all, but limits *power actions* within 6 squares. So they do quite different things.
April 21, 2022
m1a1l
personally I prefer the Giant Size version because it limited the powers to 6 squares and now it must be adjacent... In golden I prefer the old version
